key.name: use-dark-theme
key.summary: Specifies if Corebird should request to use the dark variant of the gtk theme

key.name: minimize-when-close
key.summary: Minimizes the window to the tray instead of closing the app

key.name: new-tweets-notify
key.summary: If/when the user should be notified about new tweets

key.name: new-mentions-notify
key.summary: Whether the user should be notified when another user mentions them in a tweet

key.name: new-dms-notify
key.summary: Whether the user should be notified when another user writes them a direct message

key.name: new-followers-notify
key.summary: Whether the user should be notified when another user starts following them

key.name: show-inline-media
key.summary: Whether inline media should be downloaded/shown directly.
key.description: Disable this to save some bandwidth

key.name: startup-accounts
key.summary: List of accounts which will be opened when Corebird is started.

key.name: max-media-size
key.summary: Maximum size of inline media to download, in Megabytes.

key.name: sidebar-visible
key.summary: Whether to show the sidebar or not

key.name: accel-compose-tweet
key.summary: The accelerator to press in order to bring the ComposeTweetWindow up. Must be parseable with gtk_accelerator_parse

key.name: accel-toggle-sidebar
key.summary: Accelerator to press in order to show/hide the sidebar

key.name: settings-geometry
key.summary: Size and position of the settings dialog
